name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ ゆき
summary:
ひどい肩こりに悩む少女ゆき
ある日彼女は『神の手＝ゴッドハンドを持つ男』
と噂される指圧師のもとを訪れた
--
YUKI is a girl suffering from chronic stiff shoulders.
YUKI is a girl suffering from chronic stiff
shoulders. One day,she visited a master of
"SHIATSU"(finger press)calld "The Man with
the Hand of God".

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do
by using Hand of God!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
